body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Parmelia Sams. Married to Elisabeth Neale Sams in Anderson County, Kentucky on April 13, 1852. Father of Lenora Sams. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Trimble County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Trimble County in 1860.
